parameters.value: --mode mixed --token-range-slices=10000 --partition-key-buffer-reuse-size=256 --seed=29 --schema-seed=29 --dataset-size=large --cql-features normal --warmup 2m --duration 30m --drop-schema true --fail-fast --level=info --test-host-selection-policy token-aware --oracle-host-selection-policy token-aware --test-cluster=192.168.100.3,192.168.100.4,192.168.100.5 --oracle-cluster=192.168.100.2 --request-timeout 5s --connect-timeout 120s --use-server-timestamps false --async-objects-stabilization-attempts 10 --async-objects-stabilization-backoff 10ms --replication-strategy "{'class': 'NetworkTopologyStrategy', 'replication_factor': '1'}" --oracle-replication-strategy "{'class': 'NetworkTopologyStrategy', 'replication_factor': '1'}" --max-mutation-retries 5 --max-mutation-retries-backoff 10ms --concurrency=12 --profiling-port 6060 --statement-log-file-compression=zstd --oracle-statement-log-file=./results/oracle-statements.log.zst --test-statement-log-file=./results/test-statements.log.zst --partition-key-distribution=uniform
